title: Been here since season 1 now it feels like ive wasted my time
body:
hi 
I have played this games since season 1 enjoyed my time met a lot of good friends and had a lot of fun, I have worked myself up from bronze  to plat through the seasons with help of others but now I'm lost, 

I recently played a few normal games as Brand/ Le Blanc I have been using them a lot recently and was having some really good games with them where I was 20/5 34/8 in, one occasion I Azir reported me for scripting because he was diving and dieing to me and now ive tried to log on and find out I am permanently banned till 2022 due to I have been scripting. (wdf is this scripting) I have tried to find out why this have happen through the  forums I pretty much get told no reason just sends me a link telling me ive cheated. 
i am at my wits end with this being ive enjoyed my time here but it feels like no matter how good i done to get where i was is now wasted 

i just thought i would share my experience being this my or may not have happened to anyone else :(

replies.body:
Hey Let Me B Ur Hero,


As this is a discussion pertaining to one of the Player Behavior & Reform systems [Permanent Suspension, 3rd Party Applications] in League of Legends, the best place for this discussion would be the [**Player Behavior & Moderation**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) sub-boards. I, another Arbiter, or a member of the community would love to have a more in-depth conversation with you about this topic there!
